TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler(object sender, WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示將會處理 物件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的方法委派時將會呼叫就會引發事件。The method specified in the delegate will be called when a event is raised. 網頁開發人員可以提供網頁組件事件的自訂處理常式加`OnDisplayModeChanged`屬性``項目 頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Part events by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanged` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 自訂處理常式也可以指派以程式設計的方式。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 如需有關以程式設計的方式指派的事件處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 連接事件處理常式方法的事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
